pr_title: Adding the keying/think time to each transaction.

timeline.message:
[WIP] Adding the keying/think time to each transaction.

Summary:
Added support for keying and think times for each transaction that can
be controlled using a configuration parameter.

Changed the default configuration values to support running the workload
optimally according to the specs.

Changed some part of the Load workload to strictly follow the standard.

Reviewers:
Neha, Karthik

timeline.bodyText:
It might be good to add a comment on top of this (and the next) function with the TPCC spec and the relevant section that specifies these values.
Also, perhaps consider renaming this function with the units at the end, such as: getKeyingTimeMillis() if it is in millis.
timeline.author: rkarthik007

timeline.bodyText: Do we need this variable and the following LOG.info to measure the sleep time? We should get rid of these I feel.
timeline.author: rkarthik007

replies.bodyText:
I did this for debugging.
WOuldn't be part of the final code.
replies.author: psudheer21

timeline.author: rkarthik007

replies.bodyText: Debugging. Won't be in the final code.
replies.author: psudheer21

timeline.bodyText: With these defaults, we'll use keying and think time for other workloads like workload_1, workload_2 etc. also. Just want to make sure that it's intentional.
timeline.author: ndeodhar

replies.bodyText:
workload_all should be what we should run now. And all of our defaults should be to make it run easy for that.
For the other workloads we can still make it false and then run it.
replies.author: psudheer21

timeline.bodyText: Please add this to the description as well - since your diff includes more than just the changes for think/keying time.
timeline.author: ndeodhar

replies.bodyText: The comment already had these details/. {point 3 in the message above}
replies.author: psudheer21
